com.squareup.picasso

Class Picasso.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.picasso.Picasso.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Picasso

    public static class Picasso.Builder
extends Object
    Fluent API for creating Picasso instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Picasso.Builder(android.content.Context context)
      Start building a new Picasso instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Picasso build()
      Create the Picasso instance.
      Picasso.Builder debugging(boolean debugging)
      Whether debugging is enabled or not.
      Picasso.Builder downloader(Downloader downloader)
      Specify the Downloader that will be used for downloading images.
      Picasso.Builder executor(ExecutorService executorService)
      Specify the executor service for loading images in the background.
      Picasso.Builder listener(Picasso.Listener listener)
      Specify a listener for interesting events.
      Picasso.Builder memoryCache(Cache memoryCache)
      Specify the memory cache used for the most recent images.
      Picasso.Builder requestTransformer(Picasso.RequestTransformer transformer)
      Specify a transformer for all incoming requests.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
